title: Meg Whitman, Sports Teams Reaction to Kenosha
itunes:title: Meg Whitman, Sports Teams Reaction to Kenosha
description:
Guests: Joe Madison, host the Black Eagle on Sirius XM, legendary civil rights activist, Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union, aChris Hahn, Host of "The Aggressive Progressive" podcast, former-senior aide to Senator Chuck Schumer, and Meg Whitman, CEO of Quibi, and former HP CEO.

Bloomberg's Michael Barr, Jason Kelly and Mike Lynch also spoke with Jason Wright, President of the NFL's Washington Football team about the reaction of professional athletes to racial injustice.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
